subject: Baseball
Hedge Funds
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Cohen, with a net worth of $8 billion, appears to be a serious player in the bidding to purchase a minority share of the Mets.
snippet: Steven A. Cohen, with a net worth of $8 billion, appears to be a serious player in the bidding to purchase a minority share of the Mets.
